channel.title: AI Agents on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in AI Agents on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 16: The Negotiating Machine
item.description: You’re buying a car. Not you personally, your AI agent is buying a car on your behalf. It knows your budget, your preferences, your constraints. It’s been authorized to negotiate, to commit, to close the deal.
